TopicTitle: Othuyeg's Media Thread - Tales of failure and success.

Articles.Content:
Okay, straight to business. I make low quality videos of me playing kerbal. The videos are mostly unrelated. All of my videos are on Twitch and I try to do highlights that show the interesting bits. There are also DayZ related videos there, so I will try and pick the KSP related ones here.

My videos can be found here:

http://www.twitch.tv/othuyeg/profile

Notable videos, that might spark interest:

A kerbal cannon:

http://www.twitch.tv/othuyeg/c/3875148

http://www.twitch.tv/othuyeg/c/3873075

Doing tricks with a spaceplane and landing on KSC inner streets:

The hard landing http://www.twitch.tv/othuyeg/c/3868521

The easy one http://www.twitch.tv/othuyeg/b/510241475

A longer video of me playing with the same plane. This one includes all of the failures, so those who like to laugh at failures... here is a treat for you guys:

http://www.twitch.tv/othuyeg/b/510239254

Two videos of me flying a plane I built without any planning (Remember, failure is an option):

http://www.twitch.tv/othuyeg/c/3801861

http://www.twitch.tv/othuyeg/c/3802657

A super long video of me doing an EVA from minmus to Kerbin Orbit:

http://www.twitch.tv/othuyeg/b/510623522

An addition to the EVA video, fixing the orbit around Kerbin (short one):

http://www.twitch.tv/othuyeg/b/510644883

I love feedback, good or bad. Also, I am well aware that my microphone had an audio quality slightly worse than that of a potato. Can't fix that, can't be bothered to buy a new one. Also, my streaming setup is from the later years of the ancient roman empire.

Edited March 13, 2014 by Othuyeg
I might be doing a rather long stream today if I figure out a good subject to explore...

Regarding an earlier challenge in which I made an EVA from Minmus to Kerbin... It got stuck in my head so I went and did it again. This time with a some questionable tactics. Behold the Minmus-Kerbin EVA Accelerator:

Video of the mission here:

http://www.twitch.tv/othuyeg/b/511084778

You may want to skip alot of the aerobraking manouvers.

I started a new career mode. This means landing on MÃƒÂ¼n and Minmus. Here is a short highlight of one landing:
